src:
Anggota DPR Mulan Jameela Disorot Lagi
05 Nov 2019, 21:00 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Anggota DPR Fraksi Gerindra Mulan Jameela kembali jadi sorotan. Kali ini yang disorot adalah riwayat pendidikan Mulan yang dianggap janggal.
Sebagaimana diketahui, profil resmi eks vokalis duo Ratu di situs resmi dpr.go.id, sempat tercantum pendidikan SD Mulan di SDN Malangbong hanya pada periode 1988-1991. Artinya Mulan hanya menempuh pendidikan dasar selama tiga tahun saja. Padahal, umumnya pendidikan dasar ditempuh selama enam tahun.
Ternyata, profil itu kemudian diperbaiki. Periode pendidikan Mulan di SDN Malangbong kini ditulis 1985-1991. Mulan belajar di bangku SD genap enam tahun.
Sementara itu, data lainnya tetap. Mulan diketahui selanjutnya bersekolah di SMP Negeri Malangbong (1991-1994) dan SMUN 1 Malangbong (1994-1997).


Foto: Profil Mulan di situs DPR usai diedit (dok Dpr)

Selain soal periode sekolah dasarnya, warganet terheran-heran Mulan bisa menjadi wakil rakyat, walaupun cuma tamatan SMA. Sesuai dengan aturan, tingkat pendidikan minimal untuk menjadi anggota DPR adalah tamatan SMA.
text:
DPR member Mulan Jameela is highlighted again
05 Nov 2019, 21:00 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Gerindra Faction DPR Member Mulan Jameela is in the spotlight again. This time it was highlighted that Mulan's educational history was considered odd.
As is known, the official profile of the former vocalist duo Ratu on the official website dpr.go.id, had been listed at Mulan Elementary School in Malangbong Elementary School only in the period 1988-1991. This means that Mulan only took basic education for three years. In fact, generally basic education is taken for six years.
Apparently, the profile was later corrected. Mulan's educational period at SDN Malangbong is now written 1985-1991. Mulan studied in elementary school even six years.
Meanwhile, other data remain. Mulan is known to go to school at Malang State Junior High School (1991-1994) and State Junior High School 1 Malangbong (1994-1997).


Photo: Mulan's profile on the DPR's website after editing (doc Dpr)

In addition to the matter of his elementary school period, citizens were amazed that Mulan could become a people's representative, even though only a high school graduate. In accordance with the rules, the minimum level of education to become a member of the DPR is a high school graduate.
